node.title: A Special Key in Developing the Mind of Christ
node.description:
In this seminar we will look at the mindset of the Medical Missionary and how to apply that in the workplace to bring practical lessons to both staff and patients. The cross of Christ will be the key object lesson in our study.

 

Objectives:

To have a clear understanding of the “focus” of Medical Missionary Work ¨ÃÅ Understanding the connection between diet & character development Practical ways to bring the principles of the cross in the workplace
